description:
Make minidump test deterministic by explicitly loading and unloading a specific DLL,
instead of relying on CoInitialize/CoUninitialize to load and unload at least one DLL.
Add minidump_test as a dependency to make sure it's always built.

BUG=none
TEST=none


Committed: http://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=40142

messages.text:
LGTM

http://codereview.chromium.org/661081/diff/1/3
File chrome_frame/chrome_frame.gyp (right):

http://codereview.chromium.org/661081/diff/1/3#newcode632
chrome_frame/chrome_frame.gyp:632: 'crash_reporting/crash_reporting.gyp:minidump_test',
could we use 
'crash_reporting/crash_reporting.gyp:*'
instead?

http://codereview.chromium.org/661081/diff/1/3
File chrome_frame/chrome_frame.gyp (right):

http://codereview.chromium.org/661081/diff/1/3#newcode632
chrome_frame/chrome_frame.gyp:632: 'crash_reporting/crash_reporting.gyp:minidump_test',
On 2010/02/25 16:59:13, robertshield wrote:
> could we use 
> 'crash_reporting/crash_reporting.gyp:*'
> instead?

We could, except if ever we add another lib to crash_reporting, I think it'll link into everything this library links in. minidump_test should be benign in that respect as it's an exe.

On Thu, Feb 25, 2010 at 12:56 PM, <siggi@chromium.org> wrote:

>
> http://codereview.chromium.org/661081/diff/1/3
> File chrome_frame/chrome_frame.gyp (right):
>
> http://codereview.chromium.org/661081/diff/1/3#newcode632
> chrome_frame/chrome_frame.gyp:632:
> 'crash_reporting/crash_reporting.gyp:minidump_test',
> On 2010/02/25 16:59:13, robertshield wrote:
>
>> could we use
>> 'crash_reporting/crash_reporting.gyp:*'
>> instead?
>>
>
> We could, except if ever we add another lib to crash_reporting, I think
> it'll link into everything this library links in. minidump_test should
> be benign in that respect as it's an exe.
>
>
Ok, that's fine then.


>
> http://codereview.chromium.org/661081
>
